trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"></xref> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_FontSize.XLarge" name="FontSize.XLarge" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit"> </xref> 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type*>속성이로 설정 <xref uid="langword_csharp_FontSize.XLarge" name="FontSize.XLarge" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type*>

trans-unit.source: Use the XLarge field to represent a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> property set to `FontSize.XLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 XLarge 필드를 사용 하 여 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A>속성이로 설정 `FontSize.XLarge`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: In Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, the HTML rendered output from a control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A> property set to this field is `style= "font-size:X-Large"`.
trans-unit.target: HTML 렌더링 된 컨트롤의에서 출력을 Internet Explorer 4.0 이상 버전에서는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A>이 필드에 설정 하는 속성은 `style= "font-size:X-Large"`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: In browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 4.0, the HTML rendered output is `<font size="6">`.
trans-unit.target: 출력을 렌더링 된 HTML은 Internet Explorer 4.0 이전 브라우저에서 `<font size="6">`합니다.
